name: Cirno Can't Stop Now
description:
"Cirno Can't Stop Now" is my unreleased game that I was making to the event "Touhou Game Jam 2021", being theme of jam "Combos". The reasons to I cancel my project on day is: Bugs and PC's hardware problematics hardwares. Some months later, I'm able to continue my progress. Finally I finished my short progress today.

You should move Cirno using mouse, avoiding collisions with fairies, bullets and the boss while you should pick up Yellow Rings to recover your fue. 

More informations read the Manual.txt that I inserted inside of game.

The game is short and don't have a final. The final is when you get a Game Over.
